name: The Auto-Analyst
description:
The Auto-Analyst is a short, in-browser game that assesses your psychological fitness for a job as a top-secret Cold War intelligence officer. Using the latest 20th-century technology, this machine will shrink your head with cutting-edge, 1950s science!

Built for Ludum Dare 49 (a 72 hour game jam), The Auto-Analyst was made using Twine 2.3.14, Harlowe 3.2.2 and HAL v.2.2.1.

This was my first game jam and I had a blast! This was also my first project in Twine/Harlowe and I really enjoyed exploring them both. I'm looking forward to using these tools for larger projects in the future - maybe a visual novel.

In any event, I hope you enjoy this humble attempt to entertain. Thanks for taking a look!

Twitter: @chainsawmcd
